ARABIC: أَفَأَمِنَ أَهْلُ ٱلْقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأْتِيَهُم بَأْسُنَا بَيَٰتًا وَهُمْ نَآئِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do the people of the cities feel secure against Our violent force coming down on them in the night while they are asleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Are the people of the region so secure that they lie asleep unaware as Our punishment overtakes them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do the people of those towns feel secure that Our punishment will not come to them at night while they are asleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Did the people of the towns think themselves secure from Our wrath that could strike them at night during their sleep
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Do the people of the dwellings not fear that Our wrath may come upon them at night while they are asleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Did the people of the towns then feel secure against the coming of Our punishment by night while they were asleep
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! do the people of the towns then feel secure from Our punishment coming to them by night while they sleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Do the people of the cities feel secure Our might shall not come upon them at night while they are sleeping?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Are the people of the townships then secure from the coming of Our wrath upon them as a night-raid while they sleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do the people of these towns now feel secure against the coming of Our punishment upon them by night while they are asleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Are the people of the townships then secure that Our wrath would not come upon them at night while they are slumbering?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do the people of the towns feel secure from Our punishment overtaking them at night while they are asleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Did the people of the towns feel secure against the coming of Our wrath by night while they were asleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Did the people of the towns then feel secure against the coming of Our Punishment by night while they are asleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do the inhabitants of the villages feel secure from Our Might coming to them at night whilst they sleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do the people of the towns feel secure that Our might will not come upon them by night, while they sleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then, did the people of the cities feel secure from Our punishment coming to them at night while they were asleep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:97] Do the people of the towns, the deniers, feel secure from the coming of Our might, Our chastisement, upon them at night while they are sleeping?, unaware of it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Are the people of the townships) the people of Mecca (then secure from the coming of Our wrath) Our punishment, (upon them as a night-raid while they sleep) and are completely unaware of it?
